markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elaborate Talisman Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3716) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 45</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Talisman Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3706)

</column>

---

As you continue to collect talismanic esoterica, you improve your ability to create temporary talismans. You can create four temporary talismans each day instead of two.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time if you are 14th level or higher, allowing you to create six talismans each day instead of four.
name: Elaborate Talisman Esoterica
